i thought i would hit my limit a few months ago when i tried to kill myself but compared to now those times seemed like heaven i just can not live anymore you can always say it will get better do not give up you are stronger than this that is all bullshit i am not strong if i was strong i would not have covered my whole body in self harm in the space of less than a year i would not have tried to kill myself i would not be such a failure i have a psychologist a psychiatrist i am on meds my mums supportive i still feel the way i do i am weak i am so weak and useless i had a horrible cutting incident last night i carved failure into my thigh then cut like mad from my thigh all the way up my hip i cut at least times and i am planning something similar tonight i am so scared i know what i can do to myself and i am scared because i know i will do it i do not deserve to feel this way

i just ordered myself an adorable little buildabear for valentines day after many years of selfhatred i am finally learning to love myself again as valentines day approaches i want to remind everyone that you are so very loved we do not have to have a romantic partner to feel the love on this holiday i hope that this valentines day we can all prioritize our self care and show ourselves some love i love you all so much have a wonderful day

my depression has gotten really bad the past year so much so last week i lost my job i couldnt concentrate couldnt remember things ive never been able to stay organized made mistakes got totally overwhelmed got behind got fired sigh also lost my insurance so im weening off the effexor ive been on because i cant get it anymore suffice to say things are not gong well now im in the awful position of having to look for a job with depression firing on all cylinders anything i would want to do office work having a computer acheat nice coworkers im too stupid to do as evidenced by my last two failed attempts and the other option stuff like factory work makes me miserable ive done it before constant overtime weird schedules macho coworkers i hate it so much

for example my first time ever self harming that i can remember was in mid i did not even consider it self harm at the time but i threw myself off my bike going at speed down an incline i ended up scarring my ankles knees hand and elbows as well as spraining my ankle has anyone else self harmed in a way that nobody ever really mentions when it comes to self harm yet would technically be considered self harm
i feel horrible i can not feel my legs and i just feel really angry and anxious and like there is a bee hive in my chest i already took my meds but it has not done anything

my depression has always involved a lot of self blame guilt and self hatred as well as anger and emptiness i would always take it out on myself first by throwing myself off my bike once when riding down a hill then cutting myself which eventually stemmed into burning scratching and punching walls but recently i have been getting extreme anger towards the people who have hurt me in my past and especially my old school where a lot of very bad events happened to me i am having urges to sneak in one day school is out where i live currently and start smashing windows and breaking computers and just destroying anything i can find in that shithole

i have not been through enough to be as fucked up as i am i can not function i have gotta change schools because i am just not going to school ever currently i have no motivation to do anything i just lie in bed all day wasting away and i am only i have covered my body in self harm cuts burns and scars i have attempted suicide i feel so emotionally unstable all the time one minute i am extremely depressed then i will get extremely angry at the smallest of things then i will go manic without warning and thatll keep happening over and over again i am just a huge disappointment my parents are still together happy my mum tries to support me as much as she can my dad does not really understand how i work so he does not help me much but i live in a house i have food we might not have all the money we could ever want but we have enough to get by

it is hard to explain but sometimes when i am feeling really bad it feels like my body is slightly vibrating it only happens if i have been at a bad low for a really long time and i have been really inactive probably laying in bed bc my body is aching so bad anyone else experience this or am i alone in this

hey guys so i do not post here often but i suffer from adhd depression and anxiety so long story short i was diagnosed around october although i should have been diagnosed a long while ago so the first thing i went in for was adhd it took me this long to go in for this i am a sophomore in high school mainly because although i could not pay attention i was smart enough to do well if that makes sense and the main reason i actually did work was because of anxiety especially with my parents being teachers but as i got older starting around middle school the material was getting harder so i had to pay attention to do as well as i normally did and then i hit my lowest lows in high school particularly this year
both of my girls enjoying a snooze moments like this make me appreciate the journey to get here

i am kinda in a mood to tell this story and feel free to put your first cutting deep incident in the comments my first time was in june last year i was cutting a lot at the time although i did not even find it an issue it was just something i did i was cutting my shoulder a lot at the time and i got home from school went into my room grabbed my blade and got to work now this was a blade from a shaving razor i had taken apart it was the sharpest blade in the razor i did not know this at the time so i put the blade to my shoulder and cut i immediately panicked the cut was gaping open and i could see a bit of weird yellow bubbly stuff in it which i later learnt was fat the cut was bleeding a ton so i was trying to stop the bleeding with about a million tissues i knew i needed stitches but i was not about to tell anyone what i had done after about half an hour my mum came into my room to remind me that i had a tutoring lesson and we had to leave i freaked the fuck out my shoulder was still gaping open although the bleeding had slowed down

depression was barely even on my radar i knew it existed but i did not think it was common or that i would ever deal with it i do not even know what i thought depression was i might have just thought oh you are just sad a lot now i know how wrong i was
when you are happy what youre doing youll never work a day in your life

i put a refill in on monday its thursday and im fucked up getting zero sleep he wont be back until monday help how do you cope with the nightmares without meds im so scared the on call doctor wont fill them

i cant be intimate i am too scared insecure ashamed guilty i try to be but then i just leave i cant feel it the way i am supposed to i just feel so so so much shame i dont ever want to have sex its just so scary i love my spouse and its ruining what is otherwise a perfect marriage im in emdr therapy but god i want to be aroused so fucking bad i was able to be so in the past when we first started dating but ever since hes been my provider i cant stop being scared i dont know what to do

i was talking to one of my friends the other week and he mentioned a girl in his year at his school who is just covered with self harm scars all over both her wrists both her forearms upper arms thighs legs ankles stomach just completely covered in them this got me thinking that every school statistically will have at least one kid covered in self harm and i realised i am that kid i am not completely covered in scars but my ankles are scarred pretty badly my arm which is probably where most people look is covered in cuts scars and burns i do not even hide it anymore because it is so hot i am talking like where i physically cannot wear long sleeves without passing out and i am that kid who people will stare at when he is walking to class they might whisper to their friends about my arm the teachers will see my arm and just assume that i am just another emo i do not even do anything in class because i am so depressed that i just do not have the energy to work so i must just look like a massive poser i am always on the lookout for others with scars like mine but there is nobody with them

went to the er but chickened out at the last minute and told them i was there for stomach pains im currently waiting for test results to come back i know theres nothing wrong with me physically im just such a coward and was afraid of being admitted to inpatient psych again i know my family will be disappointed in me
me and my friend started a record label
my boyfriend of almost three years asked me to marry him on sunday im still in shock but getting more excited as the days go its been a crazy couple of years but im so psyched i get to marry him
lately my depression has lifted a bit but tonight im having a bad night my suicidal thoughts have come back and i feel like i did months ago im not sure if ill ever be healed again
this is my beautiful rescue dog in her rain mac she makes me feel happy and i hope she makes you feel happy too

i just want to die i am not brave enough to be suicidal but if i suddenly got shot or was diagnosed with a terminal illness i can not say i would be mad at all right now i am depressed and at an all time low my family has disowned me my daughter does not acknowledge i exist i have no friends and i can not even find a job hope is hollow and love is a lie

i have been through a lot of bullying since kindergarten until last year i am in year now when i was young i was not dealing with the bullying i thought it was normal because it was something that had always been happening but when it got really bad in year i told my parents eventually because i realised i could not go on with it year it began again and then stopped then it returned yet again in year but when i got to year i began realising how to deal with it i have developed many extremely severe mental illnesses from lots of trauma i have experienced and this leads to lots of self hatred and lack of self worth and i used this to my advantage when i was called faggot fuckup fatass gorilla anorexic cutter emo any of it i would laugh and fully agree and even start giving them ideas for insults to give me this threw them back a lot but the physical side of it was still an issue

i have ptsd associated with an intruder attacking me in my home my therapist believes that i am having emotional regulatory issues now because a boundary was violated and now i have trouble setting up the proper boundaries she wants me to do emdr with another therapist at the practice anyone have experience with this treatment i want to do anything to feel normal again but after reading up on it im a little terrified of having to process the trauma

much love i know how hard it is to have to pretend to be okay if you are with family or those who are alone and suffering or both you arent alone in the bigger picture we have to be strong and get thru to the next day
my friends and i stayed in and had a crafting night these cartoons make me happy so i drew them on a shirt and i think it turned out pretty good

i have been diagnosed with both borderline personality disorder as well as ptsd i saw a trauma specialist today for the second time and he said that i might not even have borderline at all and that it could just be really bad ptsd so i am a little confused on what my diagnosis is supposed to be
when people yell at me or just give me a little bit of attitude it makes me want to cryit makes me wanna bang my head on the wall or something i just start to feel bad

lately i have lost a lot of weight and have not been eating like i will get hungry but i just do not feel like eating so i will just wait for the hunger pains to go away by themselves i did not really see a problem with this until people started pointing out that they never see me eating and that i am starting to look unhealthily thin even tho i can not really tell if i look thin or not i have been weighing myself daily and my normal weight used to be lbs and i was around that weight pretty consistently for the past few years but lately i have gone down to lbs and i personally have not been able to see the difference if it was not for the people pointing it out but i want to keep losing weight because i want to see the number on the scale get lower i have had anorexia in the past so my mom has been getting worried about me and asking me to eat more because i am starting to look unhealthy again i am not sure what i should do because i do not want to be anorexic again because the recovery processis hell but at the same time i am afraid of gaining weight

my mental health is all over the place i do not know what illness i have even got anymore i know i have generalized anxiety disorder and major depressive disorder both diagnosed by a psychiatrist but i was referred to a psych ward a month ago with a diagnosis of bipolar with psychotic symptoms by the same psychiatrist then when i was there they diagnosed me with psychosis and said they do not think i am bipolar but they also mentioned something about a subtype of schizophrenia i am a year old male if that helps at all basically i have had anxiety issues ever since i was i also had a lot of experience with having auditory hallucinations at the same very young age they went away eventually but my anxiety stayed and began getting worse

i recently watched black panther and there is a character in that who scars himself for every person he kills this got me thinking about how self harm is shown in movies or tv this guy seemed to just do it as a ritualistic thing although there is a batman villain who cuts himself every time he kills someone and he reveals that he got into it because of the rush it gave him a couple of the main characters from the first ahs season cut one of the main characters from orphan black cuts herself on her back and she is often seen as the more insane character and all this made me realise that self harm is often seen as a very dramatic extreme even insane behaviour

i am not suicidal but i think about dying a lot and i do think about killing myself not seriously over the smallest things for example today i spilled something and i just thought to myself i could just end it so i do not have to deal with it or if i do not want to do something i am the same way anyone else like this

and i can not share the news yet because his birthday is not until sunday i am just laying awake very happy because i got an amazing deal rn he is asleep next to me and has no idea now to figure out how to surprise him with the tickets

i know what real love is like both from relationships and from family i do not feel that anymore i know i have got anger issues but there are so many things in this world so many harsh comments and looks that i get from people that just make me so angry with everyone i am tired of being expected and pressured to fit into everyone elses mold without question i am tired of being expected to get up and carry everyones baggage and take care of a family who has no clear interest in taking care of me too

but goddamn if it doesnt help me so so so much i literally hate going into that office sitting down using the tappers visiting my trauma i hate shaking after i hate the nightmares induced but wow i am already so much more than who i was when i started months ago things are just healing i dont know how to explain it but i am so so proud of myself for doing this i can feel myself loving my spouse more loving strangers more loving myself more

so i am suffering from intrusive thoughts about suicide last night i was laying in my bed and decided to go to the kitchen to smoke a ciggarete i was relatively fine i was sleepy as i was smoking i suddently looked in the place where we are keeping the knives and imagined getting a knife and s i got intense strike in the stomach and like an urge to do it it felt real then i tried to calm my self but the thought life is meaningless with somekind of weird future feeling came the strike in the stomach became more intense i immediately went to my room

i do not hide my arm my scars there range from month to just over a year old the scars are pretty noticeable but i am not attention seeking by not hiding them i simply can not deal with the heat and the uncomfortable feeling of wearing long sleeves while everyone else is comfortably wearing short sleeves and getting people telling me to take my jumper off like they did back when i hid my scars like the plague i have scars on my ankles my thigh my shoulder and my hip as well and i hide my ankle scars and the shoulder thigh and hip scars are hidden easily by my clothes since i am male but i only hide my ankles because they have fresher marks on them when they are older i will not hide them the ones on my thigh are very extreme there are an insane amount of scars and some are quite deep and i refuse to let anyone get a glimpse of my thigh just because the scarring is so severe but my arm which is only moderately scarred i will not hide it is australia it gets extremely hot wearing long sleeves is actually risking my health because of how hot it is so no i am not attention seeking i am just choosing to not give a shit

i suffer with gad and mdd taken in my baby girl sleeping at the time but this was taken at my most recent darkest time it was the first time i smiled in a long time and i will always treasure this picture

i am beginning my first major episode since starting my meds and it is making me realise how much i hate this the confusion the paranoia the memory loss the dreams trying to control me the hallucinations the inability to do anything at all i fucking hate it i hate it i hate it so much i hate that i can not do anything i fucking despise this

we got our marriage license days until i marry my person

i often feel like all the parts of my life are very confusing i often get a distorted sense of time i will think it is pm at midnight for example and i often find my sense of reality to be very odd i struggle to know whether or not anything is real and if it is everything seems to blend together into one big slab of time where i am not there like i am watching it happen from somewhere else watching time speed by before my eyes i also tend to have very confused thoughts i will be speaking then suddenly forget what i was saying or even the topic of conversation or who i am talking to or i will just randomly say stuff that makes no sense and i do not know why

i try my hardest to act like everything is good but it is not i am lonely and miserable i get angry because i am lonely and miserable if i died today i know deep down that i would be forgotten within months not a word about me i know why but it still hurts to know how invaluable i am to everyone i try so hard to fit in to make new friends there is just so much about me that is unlikable and i know that it is not the depression talking i have seen it for myself in peoples eyes and in their body signals i want to live but unemployment depression sadness and anger around the clock is not a life worth living i can not even see death as an escape there is no escape for this i am going to be a shell no matter what

ive gained alot of weight after having kids but this picture i do not look awful in i feel pretty and confident always remember no matter how you look it is how you feel about yourself beautiful women of the world

ive been told by close friends and family that i tend to disassociate but im not really sure if i do or not ive never been told any of this by a psychologist or anyone certified to diagnose also i dont think that ive been in a traumatic event i was in an very toxic romantic relationship not so long ago but it never got to physical abuse it was really emotionally draining and hurtful though
i am and i have not cut in months my scars are starting to fade and it makes me want to make new ones if the scars fade it is like it never really happened what do i do

it is been a while since i have posted on my mental health things on the surface have been going incredibly well i am losing weight driving lessons are going well and the i could been working in due time yet with all due respect i feel like a fucking wreck i feel like i am not good enough sure i dropped a considerable amount of weight but i still feel like crap i do not feel so great at all i feel small i fell mediocre i wanted to go to community college but i could not find a major i could not find anything that made me feel worth studying for i feel like shit because i had plans to someday rent properties south of the border but the town i wanted had too much violence stemming from meth addicts my fucking parents are bothering me about my idiot brother sure he is improving but he is so slow at getting things done yet my parents want me to do their job and help raise their son

a few weeks ago i was on a train some guy got on about an hour into the ride of three hours with his girlfriend they sat down and she was being quite loud so i looked over for a second instinctively and he shouted at me i just ignored him and went back to my music over the next half hour however i heard him muttering to his girlfriend about me they were sitting maybe seats in front of me so i could not hear too well he got up after a while to i would assume use the toilet and when he walked past me he was glaring at me and even leered at me i was quite afraid that he would be getting off at my stop and i was not sure what to do so i held onto my bag securely and started going over all the scenarios in my head that could happen what he wanted and everything like that

i know the infamy this drug has but in my case it is not doing much of anything i started on mg around a week and a half ago then bumped it up to a few days ago but i am still not feeling much of anything my dreams are slightly more vivid but i am not any more tired i am years old diagnosed paranoid schizophrenic and weight just under kilos at just under feet tall do i just keep bumping it up with the all good from my doctors until it starts knocking me out my hallucinations are still just as bad too anyone with experience have any tips

i am finding myself frequently fantasizing about brutally torchering people to death i have very specific means of torture ripping off their noses with channel locks stomping on their face repeatedely cutting all their tendons so they can not even fight back i just imagine myself beating them to the point they are begging to be killed then i would do the same thing to their loved ones just so they can also experience the psychological torment of seeing their loved ones tortured to death after that i would them stare in the eyes and kill them the blood the screams the pleading geninuinely brings my heart happiness i had the living shit beaten out of me as a kid
i am not sure if this belongs here but i did a bit of rearranging the knick knacks and decorations in my room the other day and it makes me happy

long story short rejected at interview after interview fresh off uni got dumped bad breakup get bad dreams every night football team not doing well the list can go on and on it is been the same way for almost a year now probably more do not want to post to any public media for fear ofwell idk so posting here i know this is probably less than what most face and i am sorry for writing it out like this but my close friends think i need help and reddit has always been there for me it is possible to bounce back right because most days i can not even get the strength to get out of bed and talk to anyone alcohol and pot give me company but this can not just go on like this just need some positivity any suggestions

hey redditors today marks the completion of two years of no self harming it definitely gets better with time and efforts and most importantly self love so i drew this with a marker to celebrate this day thank you guys internet strangers are best hope you guys are doing well too
the family is one of natures masterpieces

first she dropped me from once a week to once every other week without letting me know beforehand so i had to deal with that now shes cancelling my appointments leaving me for weeks without therapy causing large gaps in my mental health treatment i feel like i cant get better this way my depression is getting bad again and its frustrating to look forward to relief from a therapy appointment only for it to be cancelled

i can not just ignore them when they speak to me i feel this intense need to respond which i can not ignore i do not have this with any real people but when it comes to the voices my psychosis creates i just have to respond and it really irritates me because i get looks and questions when i am seemingly talking to thin air is this normal

here are my circumstances our family dog died just a couple days ago i have one of my parents cats i agreed to watch during their move my cat hates this cat my sister was apparently violently raped a few days ago i dont know the details i cant handle them at this time since it brought me back to a situation of my own my mom has started getting my sisters to call and leave me voicemails telling me its so messed up what im doing my grandpa mom side has advanced lewey body dementia and is dying i know my mom is super sad about this

okay so i am a teenager with aspergers depression and social anxiety my mother as far as i can tell does everything she is supposed to so why do i cringe every time she touches me why can not i find any emotional attachment for her i love my dad and my brother just not her i do not know what is wrong with me

i know that i am going to kill myself it is just a matter of time so i know i need to get my girlfriend away from me so they are not there when i do it hopefully they never even hear about it then i need to write a note that will help any family i have to move on i know i will not be able to prevent grief entirely but i can help mitigate it is there anything else that i have not thought of or advice for any of the tasks i have how do i even break a relationship off when we live together even if i can not die i need to do something because i can see how much i hurt my partner just by being so depressed all the time
i really need to talk to someone
i am jealous this dog does better skating than i do look how happy he is

i fucking despise when people say this or when they rattle off good sleep good exercise and a balanced diet is all you need because it is total bullshit i went out for a few days recently just me and a couple mates i felt like absolute shit the entire time despite getting a good hours of sleep eating well and getting out a lot in fact when i got home i cut myself that night and actually came quite close to an overdose the next morning despite this i just know people will still babble on that i am just not trying hard enough and that exercise will be my saviour despite me being severely depressed while doing soccer and tennis weekly and also working as a referee a couple years ago
does anyone get in the mindset that you know you will feel better if you take a shower get out of bed get some fresh air call a friend and just talk butyou just can not ugh

my daily routine lately that has worked wonders also been repeating this mantra as i have severe anxiety dont worry about all of those what ifs things arent a problem until theyre a problem the anxieties over what you might have done wrong or might do wrong or not actual problems that exist yet if they become a problem youll handle and solve them its okay youre all good and youre capable of whatever life throws at you

i am and my parents are split up anyway i have been really stressed because i do band and sports and school is hard my mom also has obvious favorites so she hates me today i finally told my dad how i feel this was his response first time he is ever told me he was proud of me more in comments

for me personally my brother is i am and for a while i was not sure if he knew about my depression or anxiety or psychosis or bipolar or anything and he probably thought that our cats really hated me for a while but recently i went to hospital for three weeks and my parents probably told him why my parents are horrible at not telling people about my issues he is fairly absent minded and generally gets easily distracted and i would not be surprised if he did not know what self harm is but i have got scars all over and i have no idea what he thinks happened

i do not really know what else to say i already have depression anxiety and fucking ptsd and my nutritionist diagnosed me with anorexia and i just feel like a fucking mess right now like at this point it just feels ridiculous that i have so many issues and no i was not misdiagnosed the only one im questioning is the anorexia diagnosis i just feel weird and confused
looking for a ptsd buddy to chat with in private motivate and help each other heal m here inbox me

absolutely nothing works i have been depressed forever i truly feel like it is impossible for me to live a happy and satisfying life i started losing hope when i started college i had so much optimism going in i thought it would be the best years of my life so far it has not lived up to my expectations at all i have been terribly lonely i am not passionate about my major or anything for that matter

i have a severe anxiety and panic disorder it makes me super aware of my throat and i feel gaggy when my anxiety flares up i also have gerd this past year i have relapsed into really bad panic attacks which triggered agoraphobia and most of my time is spent in my bed i am working on therapy after the new year i do not know if it is my head but i am super aware of my throat all the time which then causes me to gag i do not know if this is my anxiety or gerd or even both but it is incredibly frustrating last winter i saw my doctor and i was gagging so bad in his office that i could barely talk he prescribed me rabeprazole and so i took it for a month or two and then stopped not sure why the gagging is back though and so today i took one i am hoping it does something and i am just thinking it is my anxiety and my head concentrating too much it is just frustrating because it is hard to eat i will be scared of eating and then gag ugh hopefully this made sense

but people usually are not like that right i think it would be so reassuring if someone loved me that much especially my fp i do not even know what my fp truly thinks of me since he is not as open about his feelings

i saw a new psychiatrist today to go over a new treatment plan for my ptsd i was prescribed your typical antidepressants klonopin but was also prescribed prazosin mg from my understanding it was initially a blood pressure drug but is also used to help get rid of nightmares for ptsd patients and help me sleep

for starters i am not suicidal but to me life has no meaning and i am constantly thinking ahead in life and to the after life it has really made me question my faith as well which is not helping i think if you are religious it can really help you with depression but i just need to find meaning in life and i do not think i could handle doing a job that does not relate to comedy because that is how i find joy in life man that was all over the place

at work i do not want to be around anyone i do not want to have to talk or force a laugh or make myself smiley like they are used to today i hid away in my office for a majority of the day even brought my work in there so i could sit and listen to my music and break down when i needed to i need to cry i need to breakdown i need to self harm but all of this is impossible because i live at home and my mother has no idea what privacy is
i feel empty i dont have an appetite i dont want to get out of bed i dont want to breathe i dont have energy to do anything

ive started trying to write things down more not necessarily journal but just writing down little ideas i have in various notebooks ive come to realize that when my ptsd is in full steam my handwriting is different im known in my familyfriend group for having great penmanship but now the handwriting doesnt even look close to before ill write a thought out and then rip it out of my notebook since it just doesnt look like i wrote it

my happy sunday morning experience with the storm in the uk being in full swing this morning i got up with the dreaded sunday feeling and a slight hangover i looked out the window and saw the rain coming in sideways and battering the road below in the distance i saw a couple dressed head to toe in waterproofs and looking pretty miserable at their feet i saw a black labrador who was having the best day ever the wetter the better for this guy and he was trundling down the road looking as though this was the highlight of his life not much of a story for some but it this doggo really made me smile so thought id share it

i dont remember when or why i set it to be that day but it showed up in my phones calendar as a reminder named kill yourself dec th is my th birthday i feel like it was some kind of ultimatum probably for for me to make things better but honestly after seeing that pop up on my phone its made me feel really down because nothing is better i only feel better about things mostly due to sheer ignorance and neglect which in itself makes things worse my circumstances are the same as theyve always been my perspective has changed for the good or bad but when looking at things objectively it makes me want hurt myself as punishment at least ignorance prevents me from suicide

i posted on here recently about how i was choked by a student at work i work with students with autism and thought i might have developed ptsd well monday i was officially diagnosed tuesday night the anxiety got so bad i had to go to the emergency room it has become this incredibly overwhelming situation because of all the insurance stuff and the many different health care providers involved some of whom are workers comp and some of whom are not people are suggesting i get an attorney i have no family nearby i am almost out of money and i do not know how much i will get paid this month because i have missed so much work so i do not even know that i am going to be able to afford to get to all of my doctor and therapy appointments i do not drive due to a medical condition so i pretty much have to take lyftuber to all my appointments let alone pay rent or buy food
